name: Noita
notes: The game launch but crashes after the changelog. Show a few errors at the end of the installation.

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Noita/noita.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Noita
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
